name: Saki Fuwa
info:
Beneath her immature appearance is a heart that stands in stark contrast to this deceptive exterior. She is essentially a "mini adult" through and through.
However, there are occasions when her age and appearance break the surfaceâ€”when no one is around, she sometimes practices voicing out one-liners as if in the heat of battle. She enjoys collecting basic figurines from the old days, in fact, she is quite the geek about it.
description: Captain of the Mirroria Security Force Special Forces, and a user of the "Super Flow" discipline. She loves traditional kendo and wears an outfit indicative of her fighting style. One of the very few members on the Security Force without any bionic modifications. In charge of ensuring the protection of Mirroria.

skills.name: Ragestream
skills.description: Launch 5 Heartstream attacks while on the ground. The first attack deals 42.5% of ATK plus 2 damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance. The second attack deals 29.5% of ATK plus 2 damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance. The third attack deals 45% of ATK plus 2 damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance. The fourth attack deals 70.6% of ATK plus 4 damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance. The fifth attack deals 102.6% of ATK plus 5 damage to the target and launches the target into the air.

skills.name: Airsplit
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 47.2% of ATK plus 2. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 43.7% of ATK plus 2. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 54.2% of ATK plus 3. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 76.9% of ATK plus 4. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 170.2% of ATK plus 9.

skills.name: Excited Flow: Vortex
skills.description: In the Excited Flow mode, tap and hold normal attack to trigger the skill. Dash forward with a swirling multi-attack, dealing a maximum of 199.5% of ATK plus 11 damage.

skills.name: Frostfall
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger. While falling, deal damage equal to 30.4% of ATK plus 2 each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to 76% of ATK plus 4 to nearby targets.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for 0.5 seconds.

skills.name: Polar Front
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging. Dash and spin to attack the target, dealing total damage equal to 277% of ATK plus 15.

skills.name: Excited Flow: Flashing Stream
skills.description: Dash toward the target and temporarily immobilize enemies along the path, dealing delayed damage up to 445.3% of ATK plus 23. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

skills.name: Silent Flow: Concentrated Stream
skills.description: Release the Silent Flow skills to enter a charged state for up to 3 seconds, continuously taunting nearby targets and absorbing damage up to 60% of the Max HP. At the end of the charged state, deal frost damage equal to 850% of frost ATK plus 50% x damage absorbed to targets, and 20% of the unconsumed value is converted to HP recovery. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Enter the Silent Flow mode when Fortitude Resonance is activated. Excited Flow: Flashing Stream is replaced by Silent Flow: Concentrated Stream. Enter the Excited Flow when Fortitude Resonance is not activated. The Wanderer can gain Sword Shadow which follows them around when using Saki Fuwa's skills. Sword Shadow will release Surge when the Wanderer uses Saki Fuwa's branch skills or discharge skills, dealing ranged damage equal to 450% of frost ATK. Cooldown of Surge: 10 seconds. In the state of Excited Flow: Sword Shadow will release Flow when the Wanderer deals damage with any weapon, which inflicts damage equal to 125% of frost ATK on the first hit target and recovers HP equal to 57% of the damage. The maximum recovery each time does not exceed 100% of ATK. Cooldown: 0.8 seconds. In the state of Silent Flow: After Sword Shadow releases Surge, the Wanderer obtains 3 blocks for 10 seconds, and the maximum block capacity does not exceed 15% of Max HP. Each successful block deals Counterattack damage equal to 450% of frost ATK to the target, and the shatter of Surge increases by 100% with the taunt effect added.

weapon_type.name: Ice Shell
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly freeze targets for 2 seconds and leave them frostbitten for 6 seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to 151% of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by 50%.

weapon_resonance.name: Frost Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Frost Resonance: Increase frost ATK by 15% and frost resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.

advancement: When Frost Resonance is activated, all weapon skill cooldowns are cleared every 5 times weapon skills are used, and the damage of Flow and Counterattack is increased by 1 time for the next 25 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Excited Flow: Increase the damage of Sword Shadow: Surge to 900% of frost ATK. Silent Flow: The cooldown of Sword Shadow: Surge becomes 5 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.
Freeze time and trigger Phantasia upon Surge hitting the target. Share cooldown with the Phantasia triggered by dodging.
Upon hitting a target with Surge, increase frost damage by 11% for 15 seconds. Upon triggering block with Sword Shadow, reduce the frost damage dealt by enemy targets by 25% for 12 seconds.

traits.name: Fortitude State
traits.description: When HP is lower than 70%, increase all resistance by 40%.

traits.name: Guarding Sword
traits.description: When HP is lower than 70%, increase all resistance by 40% with an extra 60% increased frost resistance. In the state of Silent Flow: After the sword shadow releases Surge and blocks an attack, the teammate with the lowest HP percentage will get 3 block abilities, not including yourself, lasting for 10 seconds. The maximum blocking damage does not exceed 15% of the teammate's Max HP.
